title: Explain the March of Destiny image

content.description:
Frank Triplett, “The March of Destiny,” 1883

Courtesy The Newberry Library, Chicago
content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Using the image ,which depicts the first half of the nineteenth century, answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly describe ONE historical perspective expressed in the image.

Briefly explain how ONE specific event or development in the period from 1800 to 1850 contributed to the process depicted in the image.

Briefly explain ONE specific historical effect in the period from 1844 to 1890 that resulted from the process depicted in the image.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
